Emerald Takeaway Restaurant
Loushers Lane, Warrington, Cheshire
Welcome to Emerald Takeaway Fast Food restaurant in Warrington, Cheshire. For information about our menu, opening times, or to book a table at Emerald Takeaway restaurant, please phone our main telephone number on 01925230033.

Other Nearby Restaurants
The Dragon City Chinese restaurant - 549m away away Don Pino Italian restaurant - 688m away away Kelly's Chinese Restaurant Chinese restaurant - 728m away away Kelly's Chinese Restaurant Chinese restaurant - 728m away away Ideal Restaurant Chinese restaurant - 869m away away 101 Restaurant&Bar English restaurant - 918m away away Domino's Pizza Pizzeria restaurant - 918m away away Medipizza Pizzeria restaurant - 1003m away away T N T No 1 Chinese Restaurant Chinese restaurant - 1007m away away McDonalds American restaurant - 0.7 miles away FEATURE 8 free attractions in London It's renowned for being one of the most expensive cities in the world, but surprisingly there are plenty of things to do in London without having to dig deep into your pockets. FEATURE The Witchcraft Trials of Essex Essex is infamous with its involvement in the witchcraft trials that took place around 400 years ago. We look at case histories and the accusations that caused mass hysteria, showing the amazing stories behind the considerable loss of life. FEATURE Top 10 West End musicals You can't visit London without taking a trip down the West End to see some of the world's best musicals. There is such an astonishing array of musicals that it's difficult to choose which one to see. We give you a helping hand with a list of our own top ten musicals. FEATURE You and What Army band interview Telford-based electro-rock band You and What Army describe themselves as "having unforgivingly catchy trance synths that soar over tectonic-plate-shatteringly heavy guitar riffs, dancefloor-destroyingly awesome basslines and lowrider-cruisingly phat beats, with the narrated apocalypse rapped, sung and screamed wildly into the fray." That's one massive claim, so BritEvents' Lucy Middleton catches up with the four piece band to find out more about their epic sound.
